message.name: ERR_XRV_SNAPSHOT_INVALID
message.locale: The sand box must be related to a valid configuration snapshot.

message.name: ERR_XRV_USERNAME_INVALID
message.locale: The update must be related to a valid user.

message.name: ERR_PUBLISH_CONFLICT
message.locale: The '%1s' configuration has been updated by another user. If you wish to overwrite their changes tick the Force Publication check box.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONFIG_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: The configuration name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONFIG_DATA_EMPTY
message.locale: The configuration data must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_USERNAME_EMPTY
message.locale: User must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_ACTION_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: Update Type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_ACTION_DATE_TIME_EMPTY
message.locale: Update Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_SUCCESSION_ID_EMPTY
message.locale: Succession Number must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PUBLICATION_DUPLICATE
message.locale: Publications to one live configuration must be performed one at a time.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PUBLICATION_PENDING
message.locale: Another change to configuration '%1s' is currently pending publication.

message.name: ERR_RV_EDIT_REMOVAL
message.locale: A sand box configuration of update type 'Removed' cannot be edited.

message.name: ERR_XRV_LIVE_NAME_DUPLICATE
message.locale: Duplicate configuration name: '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_XRV_REMOVED_EXISTS_OTHER_SANDBOXES
message.locale: A 'Removed' sand box configuration already exists for this live configuration.

message.name: ERR_XRV_OTHER_SANDBOXES_EXIST_REMOVED
message.locale: Other sand boxes already exist relating to the live configuration you wish to remove.

message.name: INF_CLONED_CONFIGURATION
message.locale: %1s - (copied from '%2s')

message.name: INF_RENAMED_CONFIGURATION
message.locale: %1s - (edit of '%2s')

message.name: INF_ACTION_DESCRIPTION_PENDING
message.locale: %1s (Pending publication)

message.name: ERR_FV_ALREADY_QUEUED_FOR_PUBLICATION
message.locale: This change is already queued for publication.

message.name: ERR_FV_CANNOT_EDIT
message.locale: This change is queued for publication and cannot be edited.

message.name: ERR_FV_CANNOT_DISCARD
message.locale: This change is queued for publication and cannot be discarded.

message.name: ERR_FV_PARSING_ERROR
message.locale: Error parsing document for '%1s': %2s

message.name: ERR_FV_PROPAGATOR_ELEMENT_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The root XML element for '%1s' must be '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_FV_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The '%1s' attribute was not found on the root XML element for '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_FV_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_EMPTY
message.locale: The '%1s' attribute on the root XML element for '%2s' must not be empty.

message.name: ERR_FV_TYPE_CODE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Error decoding '%1s' for '%2s': %3s

message.name: ERR_FV_ENTITYATTRIBUTEFILTER_NO_NAME_PROVIDED
message.locale: EntityAttributeFilter for '%1s': missing 'name' from name / value pair.

message.name: ERR_FV_ENTITYATTRIBUTEFILTER_NO_VALUE_PROVIDED
message.locale: EntityAttributeFilter for '%1s': missing 'value' from name / value pair.

message.name: ERR_FV_ENTITYATTRIBUTEFILTER_INVALID_FILTER_CLASS
message.locale: EntityAttributeFilter for '%1s': Specified filter class '%2s' is invalid.

message.name: INF_ENTITY_PRECEDENT_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: Entity row from table '%1s' where attribute '%2s' has value '%3s'

message.name: INF_EVIDENCE_PRECEDENT_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: %1c for case '%2s'

message.name: INF_RULE_OBJECT_PROPAGATOR_CONFIGURATION_PRECEDENT_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: Configuration for propagation of '%1c' rule objects

message.name: INF_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_CASE_HEADER_PRECEDENT_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: Product Delivery Case Header for case '%1s'

message.name: INF_RATE_HEADER_PRECEDENT_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: Rate Header : '%1s'
